languages.text: "Окутанные праведным пламенем Великого, вы проложили путь к врагам сквозь звездную тьму, о шерин. И близится битва тех, кто крепок сердцем, против тех, у кого сердца нет". {n}Джай потирает сияющую аквилу на груди.{/n} "Думаете, на сей раз удача будет к нам благосклонна?"

"Wreathed in the righteous flame of the Exalted One, you have laid a path for your enemies through the starry darkness, shereen. And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"
languages.original_text: "Окутанные праведным пламенем Великого, вы проложили путь к врагам сквозь звездную тьму, о шерин. И близится битва тех, кто крепок сердцем, против тех, у кого сердца нет". {n}Джай потирает сияющую аквилу на груди.{/n} "Думаете, на сей раз удача будет к нам благосклонна?"

And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"

And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"

"Wreathed in the righteous flame of the Exalted One, you have laid a path for your enemies through the starry darkness, shereen. And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"

"Wreathed in the righteous flame of the Exalted One, you have laid a path for your enemies through the starry darkness, shereen. And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンの正義の炎に包まれながら、あんたは宇宙の闇を抜けて敵に道を開いたの、シャリーン。気丈な者と無情な者の戦いが近づいてきたわ」{n}ジェイは胸で光るアクィラに手を当てた。{/n}「運はあたしたちの味方をしてくれると思う？」
languages.original_text: "Wreathed in the righteous flame of the Exalted One, you have laid a path for your enemies through the starry darkness, shereen. And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンの正義の炎に包まれながら、あんたは宇宙の闇を抜けて敵に道を開いたの、シャリーン。気丈な者と無情な者の戦いが近づいてきたわ」{n}ジェイは胸で光るアクィラに手を当てた。{/n}「運はあたしたちの味方をしてくれると思う？」

languages.text: “你身披至高无上的神皇所降下的正义烈焰，在群星闪烁的黑暗之中，为你的盟友指明了方向，亲爱的。接下来，将会是虔信者与不敬者的对决。”{n}婕伊抚摸着胸前闪闪发光的双头鹰吊坠。{/n}“这一次，你觉得好运是否还会眷顾我们？”
languages.original_text: "Wreathed in the righteous flame of the Exalted One, you have laid a path for your enemies through the starry darkness, shereen. And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"

traits.locale_text: “你身披至高无上的神皇所降下的正义烈焰，在群星闪烁的黑暗之中，为你的盟友指明了方向，亲爱的。接下来，将会是虔信者与不敬者的对决。”{n}婕伊抚摸着胸前闪闪发光的双头鹰吊坠。{/n}“这一次，你觉得好运是否还会眷顾我们？”

languages.text: "In die rechtschaffene Flamme des Erhabenen gehüllt habt Ihr Euren Feinden einen Weg durch die sternenbehangene Dunkelheit gebahnt, Shereen. Und der Kampf zwischen den Starkherzigen und den Herzlosen naht." {n}Jae berührt den strahlenden Aquila auf ihrer Brust.{/n} "Glaubt Ihr, das Schicksal meint es diesmal gut mit uns?"
languages.original_text: "Wreathed in the righteous flame of the Exalted One, you have laid a path for your enemies through the starry darkness, shereen. And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"

traits.locale_text: "In die rechtschaffene Flamme des Erhabenen gehüllt habt Ihr Euren Feinden einen Weg durch die sternenbehangene Dunkelheit gebahnt, Shereen. Und der Kampf zwischen den Starkherzigen und den Herzlosen naht." {n}Jae berührt den strahlenden Aquila auf ihrer Brust.{/n} "Glaubt Ihr, das Schicksal meint es diesmal gut mit uns?"

languages.text: «Envuelt{mf|o|a} en el fuego justiciero del Exaltado, ha abierto el camino hasta sus enemigos a través de la oscuridad de las estrellas, shereen. Y se acerca la batalla entre los firmes de corazón y quienes carecen de él». {n}Jae toca el Aquila resplandeciente que lleva en el pecho.{/n} «¿Cree que la fortuna nos sonreirá esta vez?».
languages.original_text: "Wreathed in the righteous flame of the Exalted One, you have laid a path for your enemies through the starry darkness, shereen. And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"

traits.locale_text: «Envuelt{mf|o|a} en el fuego justiciero del Exaltado, ha abierto el camino hasta sus enemigos a través de la oscuridad de las estrellas, shereen. Y se acerca la batalla entre los firmes de corazón y quienes carecen de él». {n}Jae toca el Aquila resplandeciente que lleva en el pecho.{/n} «¿Cree que la fortuna nos sonreirá esta vez?».

languages.text: « Les flammes vertueuses de l'Exalté qui vous enveloppent ont tracé un chemin pour vos ennemis à travers les ténèbres étoilées, shereen. L'affrontement entre les valeureux et les sans-cœur approche. Pensez-vous que la chance nous sourira, cette fois ? » {n}demande Jae en touchant l'Aquila qui orne sa poitrine.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wreathed in the righteous flame of the Exalted One, you have laid a path for your enemies through the starry darkness, shereen. And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"

traits.locale_text: « Les flammes vertueuses de l'Exalté qui vous enveloppent ont tracé un chemin pour vos ennemis à travers les ténèbres étoilées, shereen. L'affrontement entre les valeureux et les sans-cœur approche. Pensez-vous que la chance nous sourira, cette fois ? » {n}demande Jae en touchant l'Aquila qui orne sa poitrine.{/n}

languages.text: "Görkemli'nin erdemli aleviyle kaplandığın için yıldızlı karanlıkta düşmanlarına yolu sen gösterdin şirinim. Yürekliler ile kalpsizler arasındaki savaş giderek yaklaşıyor." {n}Jae, göğsündeki ışıldayan Çift Başlı Kartal'a dokunuyor.{/n} "Sence talih bu kez bize gülecek mi?"
languages.original_text: "Wreathed in the righteous flame of the Exalted One, you have laid a path for your enemies through the starry darkness, shereen. And the battle between the stout-hearted and the heartless draws near." {n}Jae touches the gleaming Aquila on her chest.{/n} "Do you think fortune will favour us this time?"
